properties.name: app.jwt.access-token.expiration-minutes
properties.description: JWT access token expiration time in minutes

properties.name: app.refresh-token.expiration-days
properties.description: Refresh token expiration time in days

properties.name: app.refresh-token.max-per-user
properties.description: Maximum number of refresh tokens per user

properties.name: app.security.cookie.secure
properties.description: Whether cookies should be marked as secure

properties.name: app.security.cookie.same-site
properties.description: SameSite attribute for cookies (Strict, Lax, None)

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins
